= Installation = 
== Maven users ==
Add the following dependency to your pom.xml:

=== Java DSL ===
{{{
<dependency>
      <groupId>com.jayway.awaitility</groupId>
      <artifactId>awaitility</artifactId>
      <version>1.3</version>
      <scope>test</scope>
</dependency>
}}}

=== Scala DSL ===
{{{
<dependency>
      <groupId>com.jayway.awaitility</groupId>
      <artifactId>awaitility-scala</artifactId>
      <version>1.3</version>
      <scope>test</scope>
</dependency>
}}}
 
== Non-maven users ==
Download [http://awaitility.googlecode.com/files/awaitility-1.3.zip Awaitility 1.3] and put it in your class-path. You may also need to download the [http://awaitility.googlecode.com/files/awaitility-dependencies.zip third-party dependencies] and put them in your classpath as well. Scala users must also download [http://awaitility.googlecode.com/files/awaitility-scala-1.3.zip awaitility-scala-1.3].

= Documentation =
When you've successfully downloaded and configured Awaitility in your classpath please refer to the [Usage user guide] for examples.
